t=int(raw_input())

for i in range(0,t):
    
        st=raw_input().split()[0]
        
        foobar=0
        
        l=len(st)
        
        for j in range(0,l):
            
            foobar=foobar+ord(st[j])
            
        foobar=foobar//l
        
        ans=chr(foobar)
        
        print(ans)
